trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time, when the Bluetooth connection between the Hearing Aid and Mobile is re-established
This trigger fires when the hearing aid is turned on
This Trigger fires every time the Hearing Aid is muted or unmuted.
This Trigger fires every time a program is changed on the Hearing Aid.
This Trigger fires every time, when the Bluetooth connection between the Hearing Aid and Mobile is lost
This Trigger fires every time the battery gets low on the Hearing Aid.
This Trigger fires every time the volume is changed on the Hearing Aid.
